Class com.sun.wizards.builder.compiler.method_info 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.sun.wizards.builder.compiler.ClassConstants
           |
           +----com.sun.wizards.builder.compiler.method_info
public class method_info
extends ClassConstants
method_info is a class that represents a class method from a java class file. This class also has the ability to read its entry from a class file and write its entry to a class file.

The information used to write this class was obtained from the book "The Java Virtual Machine Specification", pages 84 - 118.

Note: The use of all lower-case variable names with underscores is done to show an exact translation from the Virtual Machine Specification.

method_info(DataInput)
Creates a new method_info object, initialized by the specified input stream.

read(DataInput)
Initializes this method_info object from the specified input stream.
write(DataOutput)
Writes the initialization data for this object to the specified output stream.

method_info 
 public method_info(DataInput in)
Creates a new method_info object, initialized by the specified input stream.

Parameters:
in - The input stream containing initialization data for this object.

read 
 public void read(DataInput in)
Initializes this method_info object from the specified input stream.

Parameters:
in - The input stream containing initialization data for this object.
write 
 public void write(DataOutput out)
Writes the initialization data for this object to the specified output stream.

Parameters:
out - The output stream to which this object's initialization data should be written.
